properties.body:
NORTHERN IONIAN SEA.
ITALY.
VESSEL, 11 PERSONS ON BOARD, CAPSIZED AND ADRIFT
IN 39-44N 018-16E. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF  POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 39 065 908 4527, 39 065 908 4527,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 390 5908 4409,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
